text: Anarsia ovula is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It was described by Kyu-Tek Park and Margarita Gennadievna Ponomarenko in 1996. It is found in Thailand. The wingspan is about 17 mm. The forewings are light brown, speckled with creamy white scales, a small elongate costal mark with two inconspicuous spots before it and another one beyond it. The hindwings are grey. ==References== ovula Category:Moths described in 1996 Category:Moths of Asia
title: Anarsia ovula
